titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd June 1, 1699, at Feckenham in Worcester-shire, before the trustees appointed by Sir Thomas Cookes, Kt. Bart. to manage his charity given to that place by John Baron ...
titleStmt.author: Baron, John, 1669 or 70-1722.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
